mapper.select: SELECT d.lecSeq, d.lecType, d.lecName, d.lecPrice, d.lecTeacher, d.lecApplyStart, d.lecApplyEnd, d.lecStudyStart, d.lecStudyEnd, d.lecPlace, d.lecContent, d.lecDelNy, d.lecRegist, d.lecEdit FROM bears.lecture d ORDER BY d.lecSeq desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lecture ( lecType, lecName, lecPrice, lecTeacher, lecApplyStart, lecApplyEnd, lecStudyStart, lecStudyEnd, lecPlace, lecContent, lecDelNy, lecRegist, lecEdit ) VALUES ( #{lecType}, #{lecName}, #{lecPrice}, #{lecTeacher}, #{lecApplyStart}, #{lecApplyEnd}, #{lecStudyStart}, #{lecStudyEnd}, #{lecPlace}, #{lecContent}, #{lecDelNy}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: SELECT d.lecSeq, d.lecType, d.lecName, d.lecPrice, d.lecTeacher, d.lecApplyStart, d.lecApplyEnd, d.lecStudyStart, d.lecStudyEnd, d.lecPlace, d.lecContent, d.lecDelNy, d.lecRegist, d.lecEdit FROM bears.lecture d WHERE 1 = 1 And d.lecSeq = #{lecSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE bears.lecture SET lecType = #{lecType}, lecName = #{lecName}, lecPrice = #{lecPrice}, lecTeacher = #{lecTeacher}, lecApplyStart = #{lecApplyStart}, lecApplyEnd = #{lecApplyEnd}, lecStudyStart = #{lecStudyStart}, lecStudyEnd = #{lecStudyEnd}, lecPlace = #{lecPlace}, lecContent = #{lecContent}, lecDelNy = #{lecDelNy} WHERE 1 = 1 AND lecSeq = #{lecSeq}
